 2001-13622001-08-010,  ,  JUS,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the OPTIONAL SURVIVOR ANNUITY REGULATIONS which allow a judge who marries or commences a common-law relationship after leaving office to choose a reduced annuity in order to provide for his or her survivor.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0283 Publication Date: 2001-08-15
Attachments
precis:
Enactment of the OPTIONAL SURVIVOR ANNUITY REGULATIONS which allow a judge
who marries or commences a common-law relationship after leaving office to
choose a reduced annuity in order to provide for his or her survivor.
